description:
Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy`s lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Band zwischen Vater und Tochter – Kyros und Rebecca!
El vínculo de padre e hija ¡Kyros y Rebecca!
Le lien entre un père et une fille. Kyros et Rebecca !
Oyako no Kizuna: Kyros to Rebecca!
The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!
Узы Отца и Дочери! Кирос и Ребекка!
الرّابط بين الأب والابنة! كيروس وريبيكّا!
父娘[おやこ]の絆 キュロスとレベッカ!
